text: Edmund Christopher Joyce was born 22 September 1978 in Dublin, Republic of Ireland. He is a former international cricketer who played for both England and Ireland. His international appearances were in one Test, 78 ODIs and 18 T20Is. He also played for Middlesex and Sussex in the County Championship. Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Irish cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Dublin
title: Ed Joyce
